tflagger997 A DVD rip can still exist, copies do get distributed for review purposes so they can still be "Leaked" to the internet even though the movie is still in theatres...

This the Russian R5 that is being used with English cam audio 'compilations' that are being uploaded here atm.

Yes bob6yt7 they do, but for this low budget movie and taking this long to leak?  I know of Chinese groups that get the ones you are talking about at least a day before the movie hits the theaters.

So, if this were DVD then it would have all audio.  So it is a cam.  There are really good HD cams.  I have seen two that looked like they were VCR quality, but they are cams just the same.
I hope The DVD Gets Released Soon... This Looked Good
